articles.description: Science News: Scientists in Australia, after analysing 17 studies, conclude that owning a cat could double the risk of developing schizophrenia, according to the Ne
articles.content: Scientists in Australia, after analysing 17 studies, conclude that owning a cat could double the risk of developing schizophrenia, according to the New York Post. The studies were held in 11 countrie… [+436 chars]
